decks.notes: The deck focuses on using combo pieces like Collected Company and Acererak the Archlich to generate a powerful board state quickly. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds extra consistency to the strategy. Cards like Kinnan, Bonder Prodigy and Llanowar Elves help ramp up mana production to cast key spells earlier. Atraxa, Grand Unifier and other creatures like Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea provide additional utility and synergy within the deck. Overall, the deck aims to execute its combo pieces efficiently and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence.

The main focus of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's hand and strategy while using powerful creatures and removal spells to control the board. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Duress, and Sheoldred's Edict to strip away the opponent's resources and Fatal Push to deal with threats, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent. With a mix of creatures like Bloodletter of Aclazotz and Graveyard Trespasser to apply pressure, along with cards like Unholy Annex and Mutavault for additional utility, the deck looks to dominate the game through attrition and resource management.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through the use of Enigmatic Incarnation, which allows you to tutor for creatures of different converted mana costs, enabling you to adapt to various situations. With a mix of powerful creatures like Angel of Serenity and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, as well as disruptive spells like Portable Hole and Leyline Binding, you can maintain board control while setting up for your win condition. The deck also utilizes mana fixing and ramp to ensure you can cast your spells efficiently and consistently.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back from the dead to overwhelm your opponent. It utilizes a combination of discard spells, removal, and powerful reanimation spells to efficiently execute its game plan. The key is to carefully manage your resources and disrupt your opponent's game plan while setting up your own powerful plays. By efficiently utilizing your graveyard and key mana sources, you can quickly assemble a formidable army of creatures and close out the game with overwhelming force.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using removal spells like Go for the Throat, Fatal Push, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also utilizes strong creatures with abilities that can generate advantage, such as Unholy Annex and Archfiend of the Dross. Additionally, the deck includes hand disruption spells like Duress to further disrupt the opponent's plan. The land base is also built with utility lands like Field of Ruin and Mutavault to give the deck flexibility in different situations.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, while disrupting the opponent with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. Collected Company allows for explosive turns by putting even more threats onto the battlefield. Skyclave Apparition and Anointed Peacekeeper provide removal options, while cards like Aven Interrupter and Werefox Bodyguard offer aggressive options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed, disruption, and threats, ultimately claiming victory through overwhelming force.
